reviews.review: Buena historia, ingeniosos puzzles, un juegazo.
Portal 2 is more funny, more story intensive and much larger than the Portal 1. It's better than portal 1, also I just like Stephen Merchant so it's instantly better.
It is very fun and sometimes difficult, cool characters and voices! Like the portals.
me no friends to play this with, luckily theres a singleplayer campaign
one of the best games of all time

This is a really great game, probably the best Valve game imo. At least of the one's I've played. The campaign/story is fun and has a nice difficulty, the ending is also great - so there's that. The game also has a ton of community content, so you can never really get board.
good game. fun puzzles. emotes are cool. simple but engaging narrative and the puzlles aren't insanely hard or insanely easy. it's a good middle area. Also I really like GLaDOS' character.
IT WAS AMAZING I HIGHLY SUGGEST :D
un juego increible para el precio

Ahí la tiene Maradona, lo marcan dos, pisa la pelota Maradona, arranca por la derecha el genio del fútbol mundial, deja el tendal y va a tocar para Burruchaga... ¡Siempre Maradona! ¡Genio! ¡Genio! ¡Genio! Ta-ta-ta-ta-ta-ta-ta-ta... Gooooool... Gooooool... ¡Quiero llorar! ¡Dios Santo, viva el fútbol! ¡Golaaazooo! ¡Diegoooool! ¡Maradona! Es para llorar, perdónenme... Maradona, en recorrida memorable, en la jugada de todos los tiempos... Barrilete cósmico... ¿De qué planeta viniste para dejar en el camino a tanto inglés, para que el país sea un puño apretado gritando por Argentina? Argentina 2 - Inglaterra 0. Diegol, Diegol, Diego Armando Maradona... Gracias, Dios, por el fútbol, por Maradona, por estas lágrimas, por este Argentina 2-Inglaterra 0”
优秀的续作！在一代的基础上加上了凝胶、光桥等新的玩法，大大丰富了游戏体验。顺便说一下千万不要错过双人模式，里面的关卡内容多到抵得上半个游戏了！（顺便还能多调戏一下毒舌傲娇的G姐！

This game is absolutely amazing I've been wanting to play this game for awhile but just never bought it and i got it while on sale and played it with someone and my gosh i fell in love with it, i love the complicated puzzles that really make your head think and just how the difficulty gets harder and harder..
Immernoch eine abgefahrene Story. Kann man immer wieder gut wegspielen.
Einfach ein Meilenstein in der Computer Spiele Geschichte.

The best game I have ever played.

Has incredible puzzles, with very intelligent and intuitive designs that aren't too hard but not too easy. There's also an amazing story with glorious graphics and fantastic writing.

Plus the co-op modes along with the test editor make it, the definitive portal game.

I can't praise this game enough especially as everyone else has done the same.

10/10, just get it. A steam account is incomplete without this and half life 2
Didn't think I would like this style of game from images but it is truly a work of art and a great challenge to the mind that is refreshing, recommend for the price %100.
its the best sequel valve has ever made its so fun has a great story and overall is fun
this game seriously exceeded my expectations- which is to say i fucking love this game
总之就是非常好玩，期待第三作的到来(｀・ω・´)

I got this for my birthday and was able to playthrough it for my first time ever. It really does expand beyond the first game with new puzzles, elements and even gets deeper with the story. Also very funny and has one of the best video game characters ever, Wheatley.

感觉2代比1代更加重视剧情 关卡精良 真的神作

I just played this game in 2021 for the fist time. Its Awesome, one of the best games I have ever  played. GO 4 IT !

Il faut y jouer dans sa vie. Obligatoire. Les graphismes ne sont peut être pas les plus beaux de l'époque, mais on s'en moque, le gameplay et les énigmes sont incroyable et font de ce jeu un indispensable à elles seules, la progression est parfaite, les personnages se dévoilent parfaitement (bien que ça soient des robots).
想把游戏里的彩蛋都找一遍，但是脑细胞已经不允许我这么干了。
esse jogo é incrivel, se tivesse legendas br claro lololo
très bon jeu je le recommande

A fun interactive puzzle game with an amazing lore and connections to previous Valve titles such as the Half-Life series. I'm amazed that such a big franchise was built from a simple game some college students wrote for a project a long time ago. Graphics seem quite modern even tho they haven't been changed for a whole DECADE and the gameplay is really fascinating. Perfect for keeping children busy. Overall, 10/10 gameplay, would recommend.

а так 9.5/10

It makes me GLaD I'm not you

白嫖界里我老八，人人称我白嫖家，要白嫖哪里好，不用花钱属实好。关播了兄弟们，不能太晚了，因为咱这里面有上学的，还有上班的，你们好好的，考个好成绩。还是那句话，给自己的父母争点光，别跟我学，只会白嫖，没出息，真事，让人唠一辈子。说句实话，我现在都成为笑话了，我得让人讲究一辈子。我跟你说背在我身上这个名，永远都擦不去了。不像我抹完口红，我拿纸还能擦掉，就是在我从白嫖游戏的那一刻到现在，不是说到现在，到以后我都会一直背着，就是说我是一个只会白嫖的人。我自己心里明白我是啥样的人，但是我不在乎。有你们，为了你们，想想你们我也开心。谢谢你们，啥也不唠了，有你们我真的很开心

Excellent game, this entire series is. Highly recommended!

Quite a nice game. I recommend it to everyone.

100% recommend to anyone that wants a great time! the underground levels are tough so it you need to look up a tutorial its okay. google said i should play the first one before this one but i think this one is smoother and has so much more content. all you need to know about portal 1 can be searched up on YouTube but other than that this game was awesome to play.
